description: You may be thinking to yourself, "not another mojito recipe." But this Cucumber Mint Gin cocktail is a unique take on the traditional&nbsp;mojito.With only 73 calories in an ounce of&nbsp;gin and with light and satisfying flavors like cucumbers, mints, and lime juice, it's the perfect&nbsp;summer drink for anyone looking to spice up their usual go-to order.  The cucumber adds a light and soothing flavor, while the mint provides a cooling sensation. The gin gives the cocktail a juniper berry flavor, which is complemented by lime juice. The Cucumber Mint Gin cocktail is a truly delicious drink that will leave you feeling restored and invigorated.
